plays.text: Penalty to Jon Klemm 2 minutes for High Sticking(opposing player not identified)

Penalty to Pascal Rheaume 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Brad Larsen
Goal scored by Igor Korolev unassisted
Penalty to Patrick Roy 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified) served by Brian Willsie
Penalty to Bob Probert 2 minutes for Roughing Brad Larsen
Goal scored by Joe Sakic assisted by Alex Tanguay and Chris Drury
Goal scored by Jon Klemm assisted by Alex Zhamnov
Penalty to Igor Korolev 2 minutes for Holding the Stick(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Mark Bell assisted by Michael Nylander and Alex Zhamnov
